home.desc_title: MotorTown's premier community server in Southeast Asia
home.description: Where friendly and passionate players push their skills to the limit. Race across diverse terrains, design eye-catching liveries, and fine-tune your cars to claim victory in our weekend events. We host regular races and creative competitions, and even run our own radio station. Join our Discord to get involved and stay up to speed!

radio_guide.content_markdown:
# Radio Features

- Song requests (use `/song_request` in Discord)
- News segments
- Game guides, e.g. Tuning, making money, etc.

## 2 ways you can tune in!

- Use the mod to add Radio ASEAN to your game! See below for installation guide.
- Visit our web stream: [https://www.aseanmotorclub.com/stream](https://www.aseanmotorclub.com/stream)

---

## Mod Installation

Download the mod here: [Download RadioMod_P.pak](https://www.aseanmotorclub.com/static/RadioMod_P.pak)

Place the `RadioMod_P.pak` file into:

```
steamapps\common\Motor Town\MotorTown\Content\Paks\
```

next to `MotorTown-Windows.pak`. **You need to RESTART the game.**

## How to find your game folder:

1. Open Steam > Library
2. Right click on your game > Manage > Browse Local Files
3. Navigate to `MotorTown > Content > Paks`
4. Place the `RadioMod_P.pak` file next to `MotorTown-Windows.pak`
5. **Restart the game for the mod to take effect.**
